title: Issue setting up Erigon node
body:
**System information**

OS & Version: `WSL Ubuntu-22.04`

**Erigon build :** 

`./build/bin/erigon --datadir=/mnt/a/mainnetl --prune.r.before=11184524 --prune=htc --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:8181 --torrent.upload.rate="100mb" --torrent.download.rate="100mb"`

**Additional information**

I am running erigon on:

- Ubuntu wsl 
- Data saved  on an external samsung harddrive (2tb)
- 32GB ram (wsl is probably using half of this)

**Observations**

I have run this build command 3 times now everything was going fine until the sync process was killed automatically after restarting the first time everything continued as expected but after the second time i see to be stuck on the below:
